page.title: 19GROUP DWELLINGS - HODNET
page.content: In Hodnet there is a{Group Dwelling for{elderly people,}in Station Road, called{"The Meadows" }There are 16 bungalows. The people who live in them are:- Mr/Mrs Davies & family (Warden). Miss Shaw, Mr/Mrs. Osborne, Mrs Jones, Mrs Owen, Mrs Rapley, Mrs Payne, Mr/Mrs Howlitt, Mrs Mason, Mr/Mrs Priest, Mrs Pemberton,Mr Green, Mrs.Green,Mr Jones, Mrs Partington & Miss Pierce. Mrs Davies looks after the people, she is a{warden.} North Shropshire District Council, built the community. There is a quarry under our house the rest of the land belongs to the council. Just opposite, in Station Road, is the Post Office. I think that the community was built in 1982. We have lived here for nearly 2 years. Written by Amanda Davies, age 11, (Daughter of the Warden.)
